column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I love this place! I've only come for dinner but It takes reservations
column3: the food is delicious which there is a WIDE variety of
column5: the restaurant is a comfortable size
column7: food doesn't take too long. I would come here way more if I wasn't trying to go to a different restaurant every time I went out since I live in Chicago and there are so many unique places. I recommend it to all my friends.
